androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Fit to screen when starting
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Best-fits the puzzle when you start.

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Automatic Download
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Download today's puzzles when starting the application

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Download new puzzles in background
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Periodically download new puzzles in the background, even when Shortyz is not in use.

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Download over Wifi only
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Only schedule background downloads when Wifi is available.
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Schedule background downloads even when not on Wifi

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Download when roaming
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Do not schedule background downloads when roaming

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Download while charging only
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Only schedule background downloads when charging
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Schedule background downloads when on battery

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: No Download Notifications
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Prevents a notification for each puzzle downloaded from appearing in the notifications list.

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: No Hint Highlighting
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Prevents the pink boxes indicating 'hints' in the form of reveals or show errors.

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Delete on Cleanup
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Delete rather than archive old puzzles

androidx.preference.ListPreference.android:title: Cleanup Unfinished
androidx.preference.ListPreference.android:summary: Determines how old an unfinished puzzle must be before it is archived/deleted.

androidx.preference.ListPreference.android:title: Cleanup Archives
androidx.preference.ListPreference.android:summary: Determines how old an archived puzzle must be before it is deleted.

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Snap to Current Word
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Toggles the auto-scrolling of the playboard to the current play position

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Length
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Shows the number of letters in the answer on the clue line

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Scroll To Clue
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Toggles the auto-scrolling to the selected clue in the clues list mode. (Works like Shortyz 1)

androidx.preference.ListPreference.android:title: Movement Style
androidx.preference.ListPreference.android:summary: Select what happens when you type past the end of a word.

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Skip Filled Boxes
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Toggles the skipping of filled boxes when you enter a new letter.

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Preserve Correct Boxes when Showing Errors
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Keeps you from overwriting a correct box when you are in 'Show Errors' mode.

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Space Changes Direction
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Spacebar changed direction rather than blanking the box.

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enter Changes Direction
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enter changes direction rather than moving to the next clue.

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Double Tap Zoom
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Double tap toggles between fit to screen, and your default zoom.

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Timer
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Shows your puzzle time.\nYou must leave and re-enter a puzzle to apply.

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Full Screen
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Hides the notification bar.\nYou must leave and re-enter a puzzle to apply.

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Force Keyboard
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Forces the keyboard to always be on screen. \n Good for some generic tablets

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable Swipe
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disables swiping to dismiss on the list view.

androidx.preference.ListPreference.android:title: Swipe Action
androidx.preference.ListPreference.android:summary: Select delete or archive on swipe
